title: Is wudu valid if a person who is not fasting does not exaggerate putting water in his nose
transcript: sidi from germany he said his question yesterday about renzing the nose he says if a person who's not fasting yet he does not exaggerate in pulling the water up his nostrils would his wood will be valid answer is yes because the minimum is to insert some water up your nostrils in your nose and if you did that you have done the bare minimum
